```js
    map = new Map("map", {
         basemap: "streets",
         center: [-96.095,39.726], // long, lat
         zoom: 4,
         sliderStyle: "small"
    });

     **map.on("load", function() {**
     **map.graphics.on("mouse-out", function(evt) {**
     **map.graphics.clear();**
     **map.infoWindow.hide();**
     **});**
     **});**
    ```
